summary: When a Russian mobster orchestrates a crooked land deal, millions of dollars are up for grabs, drawing in the entire London underworld into a feeding frenzy at a time when the old criminal regime is losing turf to a wealthy foreign mob.
cast: Gerard Butler|Tom Wilkinson|Thandie Newton|Mark Strong|Idris Elba|Tom Hardy|Karel Roden|Toby Kebbell|Jeremy Piven|Ludacris|Jimi Mistry|Matt King|Geoff Bell|Dragan Micanovic|Michael Ryan|Nonso Anozie|Gemma Arterton|David Bark-Jones|David Leon|Bronson Webb|Kelly George|Roland Manookian|Jamie Campbell Bower|Alex Kovas|Mario Woszcycki|Mickey De Hara|Scott McNess|Tim Wallers|James Greene|Jasper Jacob|Joanna Bacon|Johnny Harris|Tiffany Mulheron|Ben Caplan|Ben Homewood|David Sterne|Oliver Dimsdale|Blake Ritson|Robert Stone|Andy Linden|Jason Courtis|Charlotte Armer|Rory Sadler|Oliver Dean|Anton Saunders|James Puddephatt|Laura McIntosh|Billy Lunn|Charlotte Cooper|Josh Morgan|Morne Botes|Ian Houghton|Aaron King|Laurence Richardson|Guy Ritchie|Tom Rooke|Johan van Vuuren
title: RocknRolla
